original_text: And Jehu drew his bow with his full strength, and shot Joram between the shoulders, so that the arrow pierced his heart, and he sank in his chariot.
korean_text: 예후가 힘을 다하여 활을 당겨 요람의 두 팔 사이를 쏘니 화살이 그의 염통을 꿰뚫고 나오매 그가 병거 가운데에 엎드러 진지라

sentences.original_text: And Jehu drew his bow with his full strength
and shot Joram between the shoulders
so that the arrow pierced his heart
and he sank in his chariot
